segments.text: Allan , I am really disappointed by your lack of effort on this project .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Look , Sally . I ’ Ve put just as much work into this as anybody else .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I ’ m sorry . I disagree . I don ’ t think you ’ Ve been working at full speed at all .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well . I ’ m sorry you feel that way .
segments.speaker: S2
